    • getRootPath

      public static String getRootPath​(URL url)
      "file:/home/whf/cn/fh" to "file:/home/whf/cn/fh" "jar:file:/home/whf/foo.jar!cn/fh" to "file:/home/whf/foo.jar"
      参数:
      url - url
      返回:
      path

      返回:
      directory
